item.description:
Free Workshops for Jobseekers
Are you looking for $$ Part time or Full time Work
Come to the Alternative Jobs Fair, Saturday, July 17, 2010, 10 am – 1pm
West Hartford Senior Center, 15 Starkel Rd. off Albany Ave., West Hartford
Donation of a can of food requested for the West Hartford and Jewish Family Service food pantries
10:30am I’m on Online, Now What?! with Steve Porcaro
Define your networking goals, Build your online profile, Add connections, Join and Create groups
Give and receive recommendations, Get warm introductions, Create and list your own events and more!
11am What is Network Marketing? with Kristie Oren
What's important to you? Why now is a good time, What to look for when starting a business, Why Network Marketing is a viable solution, What is Network Marketing? Key factors for choosing a company
11:30am USING YOUR RESUME AS A BRANDING TOOL with Miriam Hyman
Tips for developing a resume that creates a picture of who you are and what you can do for the employer.
Noon Noon Your Appearance Can Affect Your Interview! with Rosemarie LaBossiere
12:30 pm New ways to earn $$ in today’s market?
West Hartford Senior Center, (Bishops Corner). 15 Starkel Road, West Hartford, CT Off Albany St., next to Bishops Corner Library, Please call Nancy Frede 8605295579, nfrede@aol.com,

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Free Workshops for Jobseekers - open to the public -- FREE
